select cta.CTA_Id,cta.Bill_No,cta.Apply_Time,pbi.Project_Title,par.Project_No,transmi.Logname as TranLogname,loanmi.Logname as LoanLogname, case when loanmi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbiloan.Personal_Name),#{map.sKey})) using utf8) when loanmi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ciloan.Compang_Name),#{map.sKey})) using utf8) end as LoanmemberName, case when transmi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbitran.Personal_Name),#{map.sKey})) using utf8) when transmi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(citran.Compang_Name),#{map.sKey})) using utf8) end as TranmemberName,
CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{map.sKey})) as signed) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount), #{map.sKey})) as signed) Trans_Discount, (CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{map.sKey})) as signed)* CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount), #{map.sKey})) as signed)/1000000 ) as TransferPrice, cta.Cta_Invest_Rate, cta.Trans_MaxTime,cta.Statu, cta.Check_Statu from Creditor_Trans_App cta left join Invest_Record ir on ir.Invest_Id = cta.Invest_Id left join member_info transmi on transmi.Member_ID =ir.Member_ID left join Personal_Base_Info pbitran on pbitran.Personal_ID=transmi.Personal_Id left join Company_Info citran on citran.Company_ID=transmi.Company_ID left join Project_App_Record par on par.Apply_Id = ir.Apply_Id left join member_info loanmi on loanmi.Member_ID =par.Member_ID left join Personal_Base_Info pbiloan on pbiloan.Personal_ID=loanmi.Personal_Id left join Company_Info ciloan on ciloan.Company_ID=loanmi.Company_ID left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID
and par.Project_No like '%${map.projectNo}%'
and cta.Bill_No = #{map.billNo}
and ( citran.Compang_Name like '%${map.name}%' or pbitran.Personal_Name like '%${map.name}%' )
and CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{map.sKey})) as signed) = #{map.TransPrincipal}
order by cta.Apply_Time desc
order by cta.Apply_Time asc
order by Trans_Principal desc
order by Trans_Principal asc
order by TransferPrice desc
order by TransferPrice asc
